output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, CMF 11240017 is present, indicating this is electoral propaganda material.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" who is a presidential candidate (Position 3 - PSD).
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, it's a paid advertisement targeting between 100,001-500,000 people in Bihor area.
4. Electoral objective: Yes, explicitly asks for votes ("votați Marcel Ciolacu președinte") for the presidential election.
5. Journalism: No, this is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content.
6. Personal opinion: No, this is a structured campaign message with clear call to action.
The post violates Article 55 t) because: - It's active electoral propaganda for the presidential elections after the campaign period - Contains direct call to vote for a specific presidential candidate - Has CMF number confirming its propaganda status - Is a paid advertisement reaching a large audience - Uses clear electoral messaging ("votați Marcel Ciolacu președinte")

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains explicit call to vote - Uses official campaign messaging (CMF number) - Is paid advertising - Directly names presidential candidate - Makes electoral promises - Has clear electoral objective
conclusion.message-for-police: Infomed Pro SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin continuarea propagandei electorale pentru alegerile prezidentiale dupa incheierea campaniei electorale, prin postarea cu ID 1283780659398512 pe Facebook. Postarea, activa dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, contine un indemn direct la vot pentru candidatul prezidential Marcel Ciolacu ("votați Marcel Ciolacu președinte"), are numar CMF 11240017 care confirma natura sa de material de propaganda electorala, si este o reclama platita ce ajunge la un public de peste 100.000 de persoane. Mesajul are un clar obiectiv electoral, facand promisiuni electorale si solicitand explicit votul pentru un candidat la alegerile prezidentiale, reprezentand astfel continuarea propagandei electorale dupa incheierea perioadei legale de campanie.
